did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
George Bowles Papers
1976-1984

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of George Bowles, 1976-1984, Accession # 10708, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library on January 6, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the manuscripts for Bowles' "Richmond correspondent." Almost all discuss Virginia politics although national concerns are mentioned occasionally. Gubernatorial and United States senatorial elections and candidates, party politics, and issues before the General Assembly are the chief topics.
